name: Francisco Rodríguez
role: Data Scientist | Machine Learning & AI | Data Analytics and Visualization
intro: I am a Data Scientist specializing in Machine Learning, Data Engineering, and Advanced Analytics. With a strong foundation in Physics and Mathematics, I excel at applying data-driven solutions to complex problems. My expertise includes ETL automation, predictive modeling, and interactive data visualization using Python, R, SQL, Power BI, and Tableau.
about_me_description: Passionate about continuous learning and innovation, I thrive in collaborative environments where I can contribute new ideas and drive impact. I enjoy translating complex data insights into actionable strategies, empowering both technical and non-technical stakeholders to make informed decisions.
hobbies: Beyond data science, I’m an active member of a percussion group. I also enjoy fitness, dancing, and spending quality time with my dog.
